trans-unit.source: Exposes the header of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> types to UI Automation when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Expõe o cabeçalho de tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> à Automação da Interface do Usuário quando um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> é recolhido.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado a este par de automação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the header of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle do cabeçalho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the header of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de classe do cabeçalho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the header of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome de classe do cabeçalho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name that describes the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome que descreve o elemento associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The name that describes the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome que descreve o elemento associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento associado a esse par de automação contém dados que são apresentados ao usuário.
